author: Gabriele Steinhauser
title: Jacob Zuma’s Exit From South Africa Presidency to Be Finalized Monday, Party Leader Says
text:
CAPE TOWN, South Africa—The leader of South Africa’s ruling African National Congress said on Sunday that a protracted battle over the potential resignation of President Jacob Zuma will be concluded Monday.
Mr. Zuma hasn’t publicly commented on the most recent push to remove him. His spokesman didn’t immediately respond to a request for comment.
